name: Project Frozen \u2013 Great News!  We have a Partnership Deal!
blurb: From the creators of over 50 PC and console games, a mind-bogglingly addictive Match 3 game with turn-by-turn virtual betting.

rewards.reward: Player - \u00a35 or more!\r\n\u00a35 backers receive \u00a350 of Game Coins and \u00a325 of Game Cash to buy virtual items in all versions of the KOYNZ game.

Supporter - \u00a315 or more!\r\nUnlimited Free Play  and Unlimited Game Cash to buy virtual items, a Stand-Alone version of the finished game, Your name in the Supporters credits secrion of the live game.

Member - £25 or more!
All of the above, plus...
Your name in the Members credits section of the live game, Access to the Developer's Diary,
Access to Beta Test games and Game Testing Forum, Digital copies of the Game Specification and Concept Artwork, A KOYNZ digital poster.

Backer - £35 or More
All of the above, plus,
Printed copies of the Game Specification and Concept Artwork
Printed KOYNZ Poster and Notebook

Silver Member - \u00a350 or more!\r\nAll of the above plus,\r\nYour name in the SIlver Members section of the game credits, a Printed and signed Game Specification and Concept Artwork, Printed and signed KOYNZ poster, KOYNZ Pen and Notebook, Signed Photo of the Development Team, KOYNZ T-Shirt (choice of 3) & Ball Cap.

Gold Member - £100 or more!
All of the above plus...
Personal signed Letter of Thanks from the Development Team and a Signed Photo.
Frequent updates of the game before go-live,
A KOYNZ Holdall or Backpack containing...
KOYNZ T-Shirt, Ball Cap, Pen, Notebook, Cup, and a pack of KOYNZ Limited Edition Candy!

Clothing Pack -\u00a3150 or more!\r\nAll of the above, except the backpack contains...\r\n1 Limited Edition KOYNZ Jacket, 1 x T-Shirt, 1 x Ball Cap, 1 x Beanie Hat, 1 x Gloves, 2 x Pen Notebook, and a Mouse Mat, 1 x KOYNZ Cup, 1 pack of KOYNZ Limited Edition Candy.

Family XMAS gift pack - £200 or more!
All above game related stuff plus... a holdall containing...
A unique KOYNZ Limited Edition Teddy Bear, 
2 x KOYNZ T-Shirts, 2 x Ball Caps, 2 x Beanie Hats, 2 x Pairs of Gloves, 2 x Pens, 2 x  Notebooks, 2 x Mouse Mats, 2 Pairs of Gloves, 2 x Packs of KOYNZ Limited Edition Candy.

Make Me Famous!!! - £1000 or more!
All of the game related stuff plus...
We'll make a cartoon image avatar of You or Your Pet. Your Avatar will gift play KOYNZ to players around the world!  ...so you'll be famous in no time!
You'll also receive...
1 x KOYNZ 16gig USB Memory Sitck, 1 x KOYNZ LImited Edition Teddy Bear,
A KOYNZ Holdall or Backpack containing Limited Edition items including...
2 x Wristwatches, 2 x Hoodies, 2 x T-Shirts, 2 x Ball Caps, 2 x Beanie Hats, 2 Pairs of Gloves, 2 x Pens, 2 x Notebooks, 2 x Mouse Mats, 4 x KOYNZ Cups, and 2 Packs of KOYNZ Candy.

The Game Dedication! - £5000
A very Unique and Exclusive package!

A unique opportunty to have our game dedicated to you or the one you love!  This is a full screen dedication at the beginning of the game that will be seen by a huge number of people!

You will also be invited to spend a day with our Development Team. We will have dinner in the evening and you will be presented an original work or art created by our artists as a token of our gratitude. You will be presented wth a framed and signed photos, and, a video our our meeting. There will also be an editorial on our website about your visit.

You will receive a unique a very personalised version of the game that you may distribute to your friends.

You will also receive...

A unique KOYNZ Executive wristwatch certified NO.1 (Made by Seiko), 2 x Exclusive Carbon FIbre Rollerball and Ballpoint Pens, 2 x KOYNZ Directors Chairs with your name embossed, You will also receive a holdall containing unique items exlcusive to this package including...
2 x KOYNX Exclusive Jackets, 2 x Kimono Robes, 2 Pairs of Slippers, 2 x Hoodies, 4 x T-Shirts, 4 x Ball Caps, 4 x Beanie Hats, 4 Pairs of Gloves, 4 x Pens Notebook Mouse Mats. 6 x Cups, and plenty of KOYNZ Limited Edition C, and, 4 x KOYNZ Teddy Bears (unique to this package).
